Note: Poster includes two pages consisting of an explanation of the translation from French of the poster  ""A la memoire de,""  IMAGE NO.PT131425.  ""3-7455"" appears on bottom right of poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Poster text of ""Memorial from France"" is an interpretation of the illustrated symbolical group and a translation of the inscription, for the poster ""A la memoire de,"" which was the  copy of the French cerificate going to relatives of the men honored who died fighting in the war in France. Also appearing with this on two separate papers is a Bulletin, publicity #9, on the subject of the interpretation of the French certificates. This is from the American Legion National Headquarters in Indianapolis, Ind.
